isis.stitle: 3300 HOOD, GRILLE, FENDERS AND BUMPER - Install - Hood Latches

svcproc.title: Hood Latches
svcproc.para: With hood in the tilted position:

step1.para: Align the mounting holes of the lower latch assembly with the mounting holes in the cowl assembly.
Insert the mounting bolts through the lower bracket assembly and cowl section. Install the flat washer and lock nut on the inside of the cowl section and tighten.
Tighten lower latch bracket mounting bolts to 34 to 38 LBF-FT (46 to 51 Nm).
Locate the latching arm and clip assembly and place in the upper bracket assembly.
Place the upper bracket latch mechanism ( Figure 51, Item 2) on the hood section and align the mounting holes on the bracket with those located on the hood assembly.
Insert the mounting bolts through the latching assembly and hood.
Install the flat washer and lock nuts on the mounting bolts and tighten.
Tighten upper mounting bolts to 34 to 38 LBF-FT (46 to 51 Nm).
Follow same procedure for installation on opposite side.
Lower hood and latch both sides of the hood.
